Package com.ibm.eznosql.options

Class DatabaseOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.eznosql.options.DatabaseOptions
  • public class DatabaseOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The DatabaseOptions class represents optional configuration parameters when defining a new EzNoSQL Database. The class utilizes a Builder pattern to set field attributes. See DatabaseOptions.Builder for a detailed description of setter and build methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  DatabaseOptions.Builder
      Fields can be optionally assigned with corresponding 'set' methods.
